data.expected_result: It should block out the touch and not send to more then one person
data.short_description: when you try and share a file while it's loading you can still accidentally click in the background and it will send it to that person as well (took a veiw attempts)
data.steps_to_repro: - Share file to discord using app such as total commander - Click person/group to share too - Press the arrow/send - While loading click in the background where another person is
